title: Call of Duty Black Ops 3 Xbox 360 and PS3: Treyarch talk feature drop and campaign future
text:
Call of Duty Black Ops 3 Xbox 360 and PS3: Treyarch talk feature drop and campaign future Call of Duty Black Ops 3 Xbox 360 and PS3: Treyarch talk feature drop and campaign future CALL of Duty fans on Xbox 360 and PS3 have less to look forward to then those on new-gen consoles but Treyarch say they are still looking to the future when it comes to Black Ops 3's campaign mode. PUBLISHED: 18:27, Mon, Oct 12, 2015 | UPDATED: 18:55, Mon, Oct 12, 2015 TREYARCH Treyarch have talked more on the dropping of Black Ops 3's campaign from Xbox 360 and PS3 
In September, fans found out that developers Beenox and Mercenary Technology had been working tirelessly to bring as much of the Black Ops 3 gameplay as possible to the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 but were not able to provide the campaign mode. 
The Black Ops 3 PS3 and Xbox 360 versions will feature Multiplayer and Zombies gameplay only, it appears Treyarch's 1-4 player coop Campaign could not be recreated, leaving fans with a copy of the original Black Ops for story mode entertainment. 
However, Treyarch say this isn't a sign of things to come in games and that Black Ops 3 will be joined by other titles boasting big campaigns. TREYARCH The Black Ops 3 PS4 bundle 
Discussing Call of Duty's continuing story mode appeal, Treyarch's producer Jason Blundell told Gamespot : "You say that fewer people are playing campaigns these days, but our metrics say different. 
"This was an active topic at Treyarch, until our numbers showed us that, regardless of what you read on forums, players spend a good amount of time in all modes." 
And commenting on Activision's decision to drop campaign support for Xbox 360 and PS3, Blundell added: "My job is to push the current-gen consoles as far as I can. 
"When I heard that an old-gen version was going to be made outside of Treyarch, and found out the things that would have to be cut in order for it to work, I was fully behind Activision's decision to remove it." 
Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 arrives on all confirmed platforms on November 6. Related articles
